trans-unit.source: Handles the mapping of activity designer visual elements and their underlying model items.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.WorkflowViewService"></xref> class that uses the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"></xref>.
The editing tool that is used to manipulate objects on the design surface.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowViewElement"></xref> that supports the type of the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref>.
One entity in the editing model of an activity designer.
A workflow view element that supports the same type as the model item argument.
Returns a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> that maps to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
A workflow view element that contains the model item.
A model item that maps to a dependency object.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> that maps to the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref>.
One entity in the editing model of an activity designer.
A dependency object that maps to a model item.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowViewElement"></xref> that maps to the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref>.
One entity in the editing model of an activity designer.
A new view element that maps to a specified model item.
Occurs when the workflow view is created.
